Package com.example.TaskManagement.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.example.TaskManagement.controller.UserController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/users") public class UserController extends Object
Controller class for managing user-related endpoints.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/get") @ResponseBody public List<User> getAll()
      Retrieves all users from the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all users.

    • saveUser

      @PostMapping("/save") @ResponseBody public User saveUser(@RequestBody User user)
      Saves a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object to save.
      Returns:
      The saved user.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{userId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUser(@PathVariable("userId") int userId)
      Deletes a user from the system by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a message indicating successful deletion.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/put") @ResponseBody public User updateUser(@RequestBody User user)
      Updates an existing user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object with updated information.
      Returns:
      The updated user.
